metadata.title: CVE-2024-10043 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 14.3 before 17.4.6, all versions starting from 17.5 before 17.5.4 allversions starting from 17.6 before 17.6.2, that allows group users to viewconfidential incident title through the Wiki History Diff feature,potentially leading to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
